fields.summary: Add -o option in hdfs "count" command to show the owner's summarization.
fields.description: Add -o option in hdfs "count" command to show the owner's summarization.

comments.body:
fuchaohong opened a new pull request, #7641:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7641

   Add -o option in hdfs "count" command to show the owner's summarization.
   `hdfs dfs -count -o hdfs -v /tmp/`
   ![Uploading HADOOP-19549.output.png…]()
